newsitem.title: ITALY: Aeroporti di Roma first half profit nudges ahead.
newsitem.headline: Aeroporti di Roma first half profit nudges ahead.

text.p: Note - Aeroporti di Roma, which is controlled by Italian state holding company IRI, manages the capital's Fiumicino and Ciampino airports.
It is due to be privatised fully by the end of 1998 with an initial flotation planned for early next year.
